tidyRename 0.0.0.9000

    Suggest a new renamed / abbreviated term

    least_pushy_rename_method.Rd

    Take multiple character vectors as inputs and return the final suggestion or the transfermation method used.

    Usage

    least_pushy_rename_method(
  char_len,
  relo_2_end = TRUE,
  sep = "_",
  original_varname,
  dict_varname,
  use_bundle,
  adj_orig,
  stem,
  abbr_stem,
  abbr_parsed
)

    Arguments

    char_len

    the maximum char length the final suggestion can be

    original_varname

    a character vector

    dict_varname

    a character vector to use first if a dictionary term exists

    adj_orig

    the original name, adjusted for any percent symbols (%) or grapes

    stem

    the stem or root word(s), char

    abbr_stem

    the character abbreviation of the stem or root

    abbr_parsed

    the character abbreviation of the adj_orig

    Examples

    least_pushy_rename_method(
  char_len = 8,
  original_varname = c("", "subject id", "1c. ENT", "1b. Eyes", "1d. Lungs",
     "1e. Heart", "year number", "1a. Skin_Desc"),
  dict_varname = c(NA, "SUBJID", NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA),
  use_bundle = c("","","","","","","",""),
  adj_orig = c("", "subject id", "1c. ENT", "1b. Eyes", "1d. Lungs",
     "1e. Heart", "year number", "1a. Skin_Desc"),
  stem = c("", "subject id", "c ent", "b eye", "d lung", "e heart",
     "year number", "a skin desc"),
  abbrev = c("", "subjctid", "_1c. ENT", "_1b.Eyes", "_1d lung", "_1eheart",
     "yearnmbr", "_1asknds"),
  abbr_transf = c("","","","","","","")
  )

Skin_Desc"), dict_varname = c(NA, "SUBJID",     NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA), use_bundle = c("", "", "", "", "",     "", "", ""), adj_orig = c("", "subject id", "1c. ENT", "1b. Eyes",     "1d. Lungs", "1e. Heart", "year number", "1a. Skin_Desc"),     stem = c("", "subject id", "c ent", "b eye", "d lung", "e heart",         "year number", "a skin desc"), abbrev = c("", "subjctid",         "_1c.
